text: 11:16 Ua Me Ini 3:6; 3:15; Mak 12:26; Aposel 7:32; Filipai 3:20; Hibru 13:14Egha me uan nguazir ghurim gɨnɨghnɨzir pu. Puvatɨ. Me nguazir igharazir iniasava amim, a bar deragha nguazir me ataghizim bar a gafira. A Godɨn Nguibamra. God me bagha nguibar kam akɨrizɨ a iti, eghtɨ me an ikiam. Egha gumazir kaba kamaghɨn God mɨgɨa ghaze, “Nɨ en God.” Ezɨ, God men akar mɨkemezir kamɨn aghumsɨghizir puvatɨ.
